text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One fine afternoon, I stop by an<n>outdoor cafe to take a
breather.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
T-Traineeer?! No way, no way!<n>What're the impossible
odds of<n>running into you here?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: This! Is! GREAT! You know whatit means? It's going to be anawesome day!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But we should make it even more<n>awesome! Stand in line
with me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not sure what's happening, I'm led<n>to a huge line of people
standing in<n>front of a trendy crepe shop.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoooa! Look at this! The line's<n>huge! It's always so long!
It makes<n>me... so...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Happyyyyy! Good for you, crepe<n>duuude!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yep! This crepe shop's been my top<n>fav since I entered
Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, but it used to be just a little cart<n>that came to the park.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Even then though, it was sooooo<n>good!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! It's the climax on my Super<n>Charged Weekend Fun
List!<n>Aaalways has been!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then the shop started appearing in<n>magazines and on TV a
lot, and before<n>I knew it, it became this super<n>spectacular
place!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Just look... at this huge line...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaaaah! Crepe dude! Great for<n>yooou! Congraaats!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though she's crying tears of joy, I<n>try to sooth Ticket as
we make our<n>way down the impressively long line<n>and to
the counter.

text_block_list.name: Part-timer
text_block_list.text:
We're sorry, but the next pair of<n>customers will be the last
of the day.<n>Now... may I take your orders?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: YES!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Extra double cream drizzle with<n>crunchy mini bits! And make
that two!<n>Thanks so muuuch!

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text: Sure thing...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket's waited so long to<n>see the owner, but he
keeps his head<n>down in apathetic silence, failing to<n>notice
her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Wondering why he's behaving like<n>that, we take our crepes
away.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Mhm. It was good, huh, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But? What's wrong? It tasted fine—

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? That's not right.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... It's weird! Something's weird!<n>How could the
crepes here ever be<n>just "fine"?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: CREPE DUUUDE!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, crepe dude! What exactly<n>could possibly be
wrong!?!

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text: Whoa... Huh? Oh, it's you, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I'm busy. Can we talk later—

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text: Uh? Wh-what's the problem?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Crepe dude! The flavor's off! Did you<n>change something
about your crepes?

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text:
Wha! Something's off? That's crazy.<n>The recipe, the
ingredients—they're all<n>the same as before.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But it's different! Something's<n>different!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I still remember the first time I ate one<n>from your cart in that
little park!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It was like wow, wow, wow! SOtasty! I couldn't stand how good itwas!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Nom, nom, nom! I gobbled it up and<n>asked for more! Five
times!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was about to burst, so I ran a lap.<n>But when I got back, you
were already<n>closing up shop...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: My stomach grrrowled really loud,and I asked for one last crepe! Andyou made me the MOST deliciousone ever!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'll never forget that taste! How could<n>I? How, crepe
duuude?!

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text:
That's... right. I feel the same way,<n>Ticket... I'll never forget
that day.

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text: ...Wait right there, would ya?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few minutes pass, and the owner<n>comes back with a
freshly made<n>crepe.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: All that's left is to see how it tastes...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: SOOO GOOOOOD! The best! It's the<n>greatest!

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text: I'm really glad. I went full power, just<n>like that day.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Full power?!

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text:
You know, I did notice I wasn't<n>looking customers in the
eye anymore.<n>Told myself it's 'cause I'm just too<n>busy.
But really? It's 'cause my heart<n>wasn't in it.

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text:
But I remember the way it felt that<n>day thanks to you...
Making a crepe<n>with my entire being so it could be<n>
enjoyed entirely by someone. That<n>was true happiness.

text_block_list.name: Crepe Maker
text_block_list.text:
There's plenty to try before throwin'<n>in the towel. I could
get more help,<n>take more days off... It's time to roll<n>up my
sleeves and start fresh!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uuug! Oh, crepe duuude!
choice_data_list:
You inspired him with everything you have,
huh?

You inspired him with everything you have,
huh?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yep! I'm so glad it worked... Really<n>glad!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer... Let's eat here again<n>sometime!
